# General Rules for all Search Engines
User-agent: *
Allow: /
# This prevents bots from crawling your development or private folders if you have them
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /dist/

# Allow Image Bots to access your images for the Search Result Snippets
User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Allow: /

User-agent: Twitterbot
Allow: /

User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Allow: /

# Sitemap Location
Sitemap: https://cantilakiven.vercel.app/sitemap.xml
